channel.title: How do i add a 4th staff position?
channel.description: can anyone message me on msn? drfeelgood3197@hotmail.com explaining how to add a fourth position, such as mods, admins, owner...? my server has special donation items and so we want to regocnize our players who have donated with a red crown?

item.description:
